item.title: IP Camera I-162

item.description: 1.0 MP CMOS Network Dome Camera Features 1/4" progressive scan CMOS Up to 1.0 megapixel 2.8mm/4mm/6mm fixed focal lens Up to 30 m IR range Dual stream Digital WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) 3D DNR (Digital Noise Reduction) PoE (Power over Ethernet) IP67, IK10 Mobile monitoring via Hik-Connect
